meanings.definition: A person or organization that gives official permission or approval
meanings.sent1: The authorizers at the school signed the permission slips for the field trip.
meanings.sent2: The authorizers in the government approved the new law.
meanings.sent3: The authorizers at the bakery granted permission for the special discount sale.
meanings.sent4: The authorizers acted as gatekeepers, allowing only the best ideas to move forward.
meanings.sent5: The authorizers were like the judges of the competition, deciding who would win.

meanings.definition: Those who have the power to grant or delegate authority
meanings.sent1: The authorizers in the company assigned roles to the employees.
meanings.sent2: The authorizers of the project decided on the budget allocation.
meanings.sent3: The authorizers at the zoo gave the monkeys the authority to choose their own snacks.
meanings.sent4: The authorizers were like the captains of a ship, steering the team in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The authorizers held the keys to the kingdom, determining who could enter and who could not.
